name: LargeBodySurfaceAreaBSABurns
title: Large Body Surface Area (BSA) Burns
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for large body surface area burns),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for large body surface area burns),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
